recommended_degree: Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia, Administrasi BIsnis, Administrasi Pendidikan, Psikologi (Sarjana)
job_description:
>>Job Description:
As a Learning & Development Intern, you will support the L&D team in designing, implementing, and evaluating training programs that enhance employee skills and performance. This internship offers a valuable opportunity to gain hands-on experience in the field of corporate training and development.

>>Key Responsibilities:
Assist in the coordination and execution of L&D programs.
Support the creation and development of training materials and resources.
Help in organizing workshops, seminars, and other educational events.
Provide administrative support to the L&D team as needed.

>>Requirements:
Bachelor degree of Human Resources, Education, Physiology, Business Administration, or a related field.
Strong interest in corporate training and employee development.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
Previous experience in a similar role is a plus, but not required.
Good in English 

>>Benefits:
Gain practical experience in the field of Learning & Development.
Opportunity to work in a dynamic and supportive team environment.
Networking opportunities within the company and industry.
